definition.value: The METRIC is a recommendation for the containment tree entries defined in ./pm:Relation/@Entries
Presetting. This METRIC is a presetting for the containment tree entries defined in ./pm:Relation/@Entries.
The METRIC is part of a set of summary statistics for a sample where other METRICs that belong to the summary statistics are defined in ./pm:Relation/@Entries.
When changed, the METRIC has an effect on the containment tree entries defined in ./pm:Relation/@Entries. If Kind is ECE, ./pm:Relation/pm:Code SHOULD be set to classify the effect.
The METRIC is derived from the containment tree entries defined in ./pm:Relation/@Entries. If Kind is DCE, ./pm:Relation/pm:Code MAY be set to classify the form of derivation.
Relation is specified by other means, e.g., ./pm:Relation/pm:Code or extension element.
